1.0.1.name: wordpress/bangladeshi-taka-in-woocommerce
1.0.1.description:
Priced Host is proudly announcing our first plugin for wordpress users specially eCommerce site owners from Bangladesh. By default WooCommerce didn't support Bangladeshi currency (BDT); this little plugin adds the functionality to support BDT.

More

  • Vist the blog post to know more

Feedback

  • Thank you for using or trying our first plugin - We are open to your suggestions and feedback.
  • Drop us a line at http://www.pricedhost.com
